eventRemarks: Five soil cores were collected from each of twelve 30x30 m plots and separated into visually distinct podzol soil layers before pooling the layers for each plot. From each composite soil sample two sub-samples of approximately 0.5 g wet weight were collected for DNA extraction. Approximately 1500 bp of the rDNA from all soil DNA extracts was amplified using the primer set ITS1F (Gardes & Bruns, 1993) and LR5 (Hopple Jr & Vilgalys, 1994). For each horizon, PCR products were pooled to generate an amplicon library for sequencing on a PacBio RS II system. Resulting sequence reads were trimmed with cutadapt to remove primer sequences and then denoised with dada2 to generate Amplicon Sequence Variants (ASVs)...

samplingProtocol: eDNA sampling from soil, organic soil (O) layer
eDNA sampling from soil, mineral elluvial soil (E) layer
eDNA sampling from soil, mineral illuvial soil (B) layer
